title: Malaysia : number of Facebook users 2017 to 2023
summary: It is expected that by 2023 , around 24.2 millions Filipinos will become users of a Facebook users .
Considering the forecasted population of around 118 millions , it reflects the high popularity of Facebook media in the Malaysia .

Current state of Facebook media in the Malaysia have been called the Facebook media capital of the world , because most of the Facebook media users have an extraordinarily high usage time of about four hours per day .
gold: This statistic shows the number of Facebook users in Malaysia from 2017 to 2023.
In 2023 , the number of Facebook users in Malaysia is expected to reach 24.2 million , up from 22 million in 2017.
Further information With more than 2 billion monthly active users , Facebook is the most popular social network worldwide .
